```{r}
library(terra)
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(tmap)
```

```{r}

landsat <- list.files(here("week8","data"), pattern = "*.tif$", full.names = TRUE)

create_ndvi <- function(i){
  landsat <- rast(landsat[i])
  names(landsat) <- c("blue", "green", "red", "NIR", "SWIR1", "SWIR2")
  ndvi <- lapp(landsat[[c(4, 3)]], fun = ndvi_fun)
  return(ndvi)
}

create_ndvi(1)
```
